channel.title: CVE Feed for GetResponse -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GetResponse -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-35277|2024-08-03T09:36:43.638Z -- getresponse -- getresponse%20for%20wordpress%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in GetResponse plugin <= 5.5.20 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-31104|2024-08-02T01:46:04.580Z -- getresponse -- getresponse%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GetResponse GetResponse for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects GetResponse for WordPress: from n/a through 5.5.33.

item.title: CVE-2024-31104|2024-06-04T17:36:36.671Z -- getresponse -- getresponse%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GetResponse GetResponse for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects GetResponse for WordPress: from n/a through 5.5.33.
